channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm of Suspicion
channel.desc: On January 15, 2004, Michelle Nyce was found dead in a car wreck in New Jersey. Snowshoeprints led police to suspect foul play. Investigators discovered Michelle had been having an affair, and her millionaire husband, Dr. Nyce, became the prime suspect. Blood evidence in the garage and bathroom revealed he staged the crash. He was convicted of manslaughter and sentenced to 8 years, serving only 5.
